turns.content: resumebooster.ai is an automatic resume creator that takes a user's existing resume and converts it into an optimized scrummaster resume. The tool is free and is intended to be a lead generator for students to sign up for a certified scrummaster class.

ResumeBooster.ai is an innovative online tool that specializes in creating optimized Scrum Master resumes. With its automated features, this user-friendly platform takes your existing resume and transforms it into an enhanced Scrum Master resume, tailored to capture the attention of potential employers in the Agile and Scrum job market. This free service is designed to encourage users to sign up for Certified ScrumMaster classes and expand their professional skillset.

Key Features of ResumeBooster.ai:

1. Easy-to-use interface: The platform offers a simple and intuitive interface that requires no technical expertise to navigate.
2. AI-powered optimization: ResumeBooster.ai leverages advanced AI algorithms to identify key skills and experiences relevant to Scrum Master positions, ensuring that your resume stands out.
3. Customized resume templates: The tool provides a variety of professional resume templates specifically designed for Scrum Master roles, allowing you to choose the one that best suits your style and preferences.
4. Skills and keyword enhancement: ResumeBooster.ai identifies and highlights essential Scrum Master skills and keywords, making your resume more visible to recruiters and Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).
5. Instant feedback: The platform offers instant feedback on your resume's strengths and weaknesses, providing valuable insights for improvement.
6. Free service: ResumeBooster.ai is completely free to use, aiming to generate leads for Certified ScrumMaster classes.
7. Seamless integration: ResumeBooster.ai can easily import your existing resume from various file formats, such as Word, PDF, or Google Docs, streamlining the process and saving you time.

By utilizing ResumeBooster.ai, students and professionals alike can create a compelling Scrum Master resume that increases their chances of landing interviews and securing job opportunities. Moreover, the platform's integration with Certified ScrumMaster classes makes it a convenient option for those looking to advance their careers in Agile project management.

write a 12 step email nurture campaign for users of ResumeBooster who do not already have their certified scrummaster certification. The goal of the campaign is to have users sign up for an live online certified scrummaster class. The classes are offered on weekdays and weekends either in 2-full-day options or 3 half-day options. First send me the topic and subject line for each of the 12 emails.

Here are the topics and subject lines for a 12-step email nurture campaign targeting ResumeBooster users without a Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) certification, with the goal of having them sign up for a live online CSM class:

1. Topic: Introduction to ScrumMaster Certification
Subject Line: Boost Your Career with a Certified ScrumMaster Certification 🚀
2. Topic: Benefits of ScrumMaster Certification
Subject Line: 5 Key Benefits of Becoming a Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) 🌟
3. Topic: CSM Class Format and Schedule
Subject Line: Flexible Class Options: Choose What Works Best for You! ⏰
4. Topic: ScrumMaster Success Stories
Subject Line: Real-life Success Stories: How CSM Certification Transformed Their Careers 📈
5. Topic: CSM Syllabus Overview
Subject Line: What You'll Learn in Our Certified ScrumMaster Course 📚
6. Topic: Importance of Hands-on Learning
Subject Line: Experience Interactive and Engaging Learning in Our CSM Classes 🎯
7. Topic: Expert Instructors
Subject Line: Learn from the Best: Our Industry Expert CSM Instructors 🏆
8. Topic: Networking Opportunities
Subject Line: Expand Your Network: Connect with Fellow Scrum Enthusiasts 🌐
9. Topic: Career Advancement Post-Certification
Subject Line: Unlock New Opportunities: How CSM Certification Can Elevate Your Career 🔓
10. Topic: Testimonials and Reviews
Subject Line: Hear It from Our Satisfied Students: Why Our CSM Course Stands Out 🌟
11. Topic: Limited-Time Discount Offer
Subject Line: Don't Miss Out! Exclusive Discount on Our CSM Course - Limited Time Only 💰
12. Topic: Final Reminder and Registration
Subject Line: Last Chance to Register: Your Path to ScrumMaster Success Awaits! 🏁
great. now please include 3 additional emails in the beginning providing advice and motivation on switching careers to becoming a scrummaster

Here are three additional email topics and subject lines, focusing on providing advice and motivation for users considering a career switch to becoming a ScrumMaster:

1. Topic: Identifying the Right Time for a Career Switch
Subject Line: Is It Time for a Change? Signs You're Ready to Pursue a ScrumMaster Career 🕰️
2. Topic: Overcoming the Fear of Career Change
Subject Line: Embrace the Change: How to Overcome the Fear of Switching Careers with Confidence 💪
3. Topic: Transitioning to a ScrumMaster Role: Tips and Strategies
Subject Line: Making the Leap: 5 Essential Tips for a Successful Transition to a ScrumMaster Role 🌉

With these three additional emails, the revised 15-step email nurture campaign will now include the following sequence:

1. Is It Time for a Change? Signs You're Ready to Pursue a ScrumMaster Career 🕰️
2. Embrace the Change: How to Overcome the Fear of Switching Careers with Confidence
